DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this project is to investigate humoral and cellular immune responses before and after immunisation with the Japanese encephalitis vaccine IXIARO in subjects above 65 years of age.
DOC.brief_title: Cellular and Humoral Immunity in Elderly After Immunization With a Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine
DOC.criteria: adults (≥65 years), both sexes, willingness to sign written informed consent form age below 65 years status post japanese encephalitis, TBE, dengue, yellow fever or West Nile virus infection previous immunization against yellow fever, japanese encephalitis (dengue or WNV) current acute infection (body temperature above 37,9°C)
